column1: Exercise and Physical Activity for Special Populations and Healthy Ageing MSc
column5: Originally developed at Middlesex University, the first degree in the UK to focus purely on how to prescribe safe and effective physical activity, exercise and sporting participation to those living with the 18 most common chronic diseases in the UK and healthy ageing.
column7: UK students MSc Full-time students: £9,600 Part-time students: £64 per credit Part-time students: £32 per dissertation credit  EU/International students MSc Full-time students: £15,100 Part-time students: £77 per credit Part-time students: £38 per dissertation credit
